name: Noki Brew
description:
Brew as many drinks as you can!

Press `1` or `2` to make ingredient choices. `3` will switch ingredients.

Make sure to brew in the right order or you'll have to start the drink over!

  • Regular - H20 + H20 + Coffee
  • Espresso -  H20 + Coffee
  • Latte - H20 + Coffee + Milk
  • Mocha - H20 + Coffee + Milk + Chocolate

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3

Made with DragonRuby (Nokia Edition Link here)

Source code available here
